detail_desc: Ankle-length trousers in cotton twill. High paper bag waist with elastication at the back and a detachable tie belt, a fake fly with visible, decorative buttons, patch front pockets and tapered legs.
Boxy top in soft sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Boxy top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a ribbed funnel collar with a drawstring at the top, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Trousers in soft, lightweight sweatshirt fabric. High waist with covered elastication and a drawstring, and wide, straight-cut legs.

Calf-length, empire-line dress in soft velour with elastication at the top. Short, elasticated puff sleeves that can be worn in several different ways with an organza lining for added stability and volume. Unlined.
Fully lined, patterned swimsuit with a neon-coloured print motif on the front, and decorative bows on the shoulders.
Fully lined, patterned swimsuit with a neon-coloured print motif on the front, and decorative bows on the shoulders.
Metal earrings decorated with sparkly glass stones. Length 5 cm.

Straight-cut jacket in a lightly padded jacquard weave with a collar and press-studs down the front. Chest pockets with a press-stud, discreet side pockets and press-studs at the cuffs. Quilted lining.

Straight-cut jacket in a lightly padded jacquard weave with a collar and press-studs down the front. Chest pockets with a press-stud, discreet side pockets and press-studs at the cuffs. Quilted lining.
Ankle-length culottes in cotton denim. High, frill-trimmed paper bag waist with covered elastication and a detachable tie belt. Pockets in the side seams and wide, straight legs.
Metal earrings in various designs. 23 pairs of studs, one pair of hoops and one pair with a longer pendant. Size from 0.3 cm to 5 cm.
Trousers in printed sweatshirt fabric with a ribbed drawstring waist, side pockets, a fake welt back pocket and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Trousers in printed sweatshirt fabric with a ribbed drawstring waist, side pockets, a fake welt back pocket and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Calf-length, A-line skirt in cotton denim with a high, frill-topped, elasticated waist, detachable tie belt and front pockets. Unlined.
Wide waist belt in imitation suede with a metal buckle. Width 4.5 cm.
Joggers in stretch, supersoft, denim with an elasticated, drawstring waist, front pockets, one back pocket and tapered legs with stripes down the sides.
Waist belt in grained imitation leather with a round, covered metal buckle. Width approx. 4 cm.
Jumper in a soft rib knit containing some wool with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
5-pocket, low rise, ankle-length jeans in washed denim with a zip fly and button and tapered legs.
5-pocket, low rise, ankle-length jeans in washed denim with a zip fly and button and tapered legs.
5-pocket, low rise, ankle-length jeans in washed denim with a zip fly and button and tapered legs.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and straight legs.
Sunglasses with patterned plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Sunglasses with metal and glittery plastic frames, and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Metal earrings with a clip at the top and post at the bottom. Length approx. 4.5 cm.
Metal earrings with a clip at the top and post at the bottom. Length approx. 4.5 cm.
Metal earrings with a large, heart-shaped pendant with a sparkly stone decoration in the shape of an eye. Length 9 cm.
Sunglasses with plastic frames that have decorative cat ears on top and tinted, UV-protective lenses.

Set with two pairs each of earrings, hair clips and hair grips in metal decorated with sparkly stones and plastic beads. Length of earrings approx. 5 cm, length of hair clips 7 cm, length of hair grips approx. 6 cm.
Dressing gown with a matching flannel in soft cotton terry. Dressing gown with a detachable tie belt at the waist, and a hood with ears and embroidery. Flannel in the shape of a mitten.
Dressing gown with a matching flannel in soft cotton terry. Dressing gown with a detachable tie belt at the waist, and a hood with ears and embroidery. Flannel in the shape of a mitten.
Embossed metal earrings with a large round disc at the top and a square-shaped pendant below. Width approx. 3 cm, length 5.5 cm.

Cropped, off-the-shoulder blouse in soft cotton seersucker with elastication and a frill trim at the top. Short puff sleeves with pin-tucks, inset embroidery and narrow elastication at the hems. Elastication and a flounced trim at the hem.

Cropped, off-the-shoulder blouse in soft cotton seersucker with elastication and a frill trim at the top. Short puff sleeves with pin-tucks, inset embroidery and narrow elastication at the hems. Elastication and a flounced trim at the hem.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Fully lined, textured bikini. Top with flounce trim at the top and narrow shoulder straps with decorative bows.
Blouse in airy, patterned satin with a boat neck and long sleeves with covered buttons at the cuffs.

Triangle bikini top with laser-cut, scalloped edges and lined cups with removable inserts. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that can be fastened in different ways and an adjustable metal hook fastening at the back.

Triangle bikini top with laser-cut, scalloped edges and lined cups with removable inserts. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that can be fastened in different ways and an adjustable metal hook fastening at the back.

Triangle bikini top with laser-cut, scalloped edges and lined cups with removable inserts. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that can be fastened in different ways and an adjustable metal hook fastening at the back.
Satin-covered Alice band with a pointed, felted clown hat that has a faux fur pompom on top.

Set with a hooded jacket and joggers in sweatshirt fabric and a jersey T-shirt, all with print motifs. Hooded jacket with a zip down the front. Joggers with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist and ribbed hems.

Set with a hooded jacket and joggers in sweatshirt fabric and a jersey T-shirt, all with print motifs. Hooded jacket with a zip down the front. Joggers with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist and ribbed hems.
Set with two metal hair grips in different designs and a pair of hoop earrings. Length of hair grips 5.5 cm. Diameter of earrings 4.5 cm.

Elasticated scrunchies in velour with shimmering plastic beads.

Bomber jacket in patterned satin with a ribbed stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Long raglan sleeves with ribbed cuffs, welt side pockets and covered elastication at the hem. Lined.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with wide elastication and a drawstring at the waist, and side pockets.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with wide elastication and a drawstring at the waist, and side pockets.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with wide elastication and a drawstring at the waist, and side pockets.
Fully lined sports tops in soft, fast-drying functional fabric, one with a patterned front. V-neck with narrow shoulder straps that join at the back, and an elasticated hem.
Heart-shaped sunglasses with glittery plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Shorts in soft, stretch denim with an elasticated, drawstring waist, diagonal side pockets and a back pocket.

Set with a sports top and short tights in fast-drying functional fabric. Straight-cut top with short sleeves and a rounded hem. Longer at the back. Tights with a panel at the waist.

Lightweight jacket in a patterned, cotton crêpe weave with notch lapels, gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves with a tab and button. Jetted front pockets, slits in the sides and no fasteners. Unlined.

Jackets in soft fleece designed to be worn as a thermal mid layer. Stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, and long raglan sleeves. Unlined. The jackets are made partly from recycled polyester.
